text: Zvino chitsungirira (Muhammad (SAW)) sezvakaita vatumwa vakasimba (Muhammad, Nowa, Abrahamu, Musa naJesu) uye usamhanye nezvavo (vasingatendi). Nezuva ravachaona izvo zvavakavimbiswa, zvichaita sokunge havana kugara nguva imwe chete zvayo pazuva rimwechete. Mashoko ari pachena (iri Qurâ€™aan kunokununurai kubva mukuparadzwa)! Asi pachave here nekuparadzwa kunze kwevanhu vanopandukira Allah (vasingateereri Allah)
